name: Margarita Cocktail
author: Allrecipes
summary: Served straight up or on the rocks, the margarita is one of the most popular cocktails of all time. And for good reason! It will cool you down on a hot day or warm you up on a cool day. Any day is a good day for a margarita.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce orange flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau®)
directions: Sprinkle salt on a small plate
Lightly wet the rim of a cocktail glass or margarita glass with a damp paper towel
Dip the moistened rim in salt to coat
Combine tequila, orange-flavored brandy, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker
Add ice and shake until chilled
Strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass or a salt-rimmed, ice-filled margarita glass
